links.*: The Lord of the Rings: War of the Ring

wikitext.*:
'''Sierra Entertainment''' was a company that developed [[:Category:Games|computer games]]. It was a subsidiary of [[Vivendi|Vivendi Games]].In 2008 it was shut down after it became part of Activision Blizzard.

Sierra published ''[[The Lord of the Rings: War of the Ring]]'' and produced ''[[The Hobbit (2003 video game)|The Hobbit: Prelude to The Lord of the Rings]]''.
